The announcement came a day after the first case in Israel was officially confirmed.

articles.title: Israel confirms first monkeypox case - CNA
articles.description:
JERUSALEM: Israel on Saturday (May 21) reported its first confirmed case of monkeypox, which officials expected would be contained.

The case is a man in his 30s who had returned from a trip in western Europe, according to the Tel Aviv Sourasky Medical Cent…
